title: Patch Notes
content: after saving him in the Colony. Combat interruptions will no longer prevent him from wanting to know about the other tieflings. Fixed an issue that forced you into picking a fight with Balthazar when you returned his mother dearest to him. Fixed an issue where attacking Jaheira at the entrance to Last Light would repeatedly trigger the same dialogue.
